comments.body: `np.log` already has a benchmark test in `AVX_UFunc`, Is there any special reason to write a new one?

Yes, the old benchmark using a ones-array as input. This code will call glibc's log function when input equals to 1. Old benchmark can not show out the enhancement of performance. And, glibc implements log in a dispatch when input equals to 1, which is faster than usually.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +40,44 @@        self.f(self.arr[::stride])

class AVX_UFunc_log(Benchmark):
    params = [stride, dtype]
    param_names = ['stride', 'dtype']
